content: inspired by the movie amadeus these baroque mitts have lace encircling the wrist and on the back of the hand i originally designed them for my daughter s tiny hands and went on to size them for tiny smallish and larger hands using heavier yarn and larger needles the pattern is written for magic loop but could easily be adapted for dpns this pattern has been test knit in lieu of paying a fee for this pattern please consider making a donation to world central kitchen since 2010 world central kitchen has been providing meals to communities affected by conflict natural disasters and climate crisis all over the world https //wck org
